body: Explore This Park    Learn About the Park     Nature     Wildlife               Wildlife         A collared lizard suns itself on a rock. NPS Photo  Lake Meredith National Recreation Area is home hundreds of species of mammals, reptiles, amphibians, birds, fish and insects. These species have adapted to a changing landscape that faces drought, wildfire, localized spring flooding, and human pressures and use.          Mammals         Birds          Reptiles
title: Lake Meredith National Recreation Area: Wildlife
